properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM COMMUNITY WHERE COMM_STATUS='Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT COMM_NO,CATEGORY_NAME,COMM_TITLE,USER_NAME,COMM_COUNT,COMM_DATE FROM COMMUNITY C JOIN MEMBER ON (COMM_WRITER=USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE C.COMM_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY COMM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET COMM_COUNT = COMM_COUNT+1 WHERE COMM_NO = ? AND COMM_STATUS='Y'
SELECT COMM_NO,COMM_TITLE,COMM_CONTENT,COMM_DATE,USER_NAME,CATEGORY_NAME FROM COMMUNITY JOIN MEMBER ON (COMM_WRITER=USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE COMM_NO = ? AND COMM_STATUS='Y'
SELECT CATEGORY_NO,CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE CATEGORY_NO BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT FILE_NO,ORIGIN_NAME,CHANGE_NAME,FILE_PATH FROM ATTACHMENT WHERE REF_CNO = ?
UPDATE COMMUNITY SET CATEGORY_NO = ? ,COMM_TITLE = ? ,COMM_CONTENT = ? WHERE COMM_NO = ? AND COMM_STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE ATTACHMENT SET ORIGIN_NAME = ? ,CHANGE_NAME = ? ,FILE_PATH = ? ,UPLOAD_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE FILE_NO = ? AND STATUS='Y'
